method.name: _generate_scene_node
method.description: Generates a new scene node based on the given FBX node.

method.name: _get_supported_extensions
method.description: Returns a list of file extensions supported by this class.

method.name: _import_post
method.description: Performs any cleanup or finalization tasks after importing a node.

method.name: _import_post_parse
method.description: Performs any post-processing tasks after parsing an imported node.

method.name: _import_preflight
method.description: Performs initial checks and setup before importing a node.
